website_summaries.verdict: A tiny lamp with a focused light and strong clamp.
pros: If you need something compact to light a small space, this is a great choice
The gooseneck is easy to manipulate and holds its position well
cons: Some customers reported that their lights grew weaker over time

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Great little light. I use this to light the prep area in my kitchen and it seems to be the perfect brightness. Very durable and well built. The head adjusts easily and stays in place. The clamp is also very strong. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas DriscollTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just like you think it works. Puts light, right where you'd like it, without having to hold it as long as you provide the correct perch for witch it can be attached. Pictures show light from only the lamp for which I'm bored enough to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Night time reading on a bottom bunk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bunk bed to shed some light for reading at night. VERY strong suction cups, once I finally got them open, I clamped it to a wooden slat very nicely. Good/firm grip. Holds the form pretty well but can slouch a little, nothing problematic especially given the contorted position we have it in. Perfect brightness, it is a warm hue. Cord is a nice length, and switch is easy to access and turn on/off. I wasn't sure whether I would like it or not based on other reviews, but it's perfect and I would definitely by this one again if it ever breaks or we need another.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all Around!
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent! The light is a perfect brightness and is warm as opposed the the very blue that some LED's put out. The clip is VERY strong and has little rubber-like suction cups for a good grip. The goose neck is very stiff and stays right where you want it. The power adapter is small and lightweight. The cord is very thin and unobtrusive. The switch is on the cord about 6 inches down from the clip and is simple to use. For me (and the price) it is about as good as it gets. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy ValenciaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great for bedside!
customer_reviews.text: I bought each of my girls one of these lights to attach to their wood bunk bed railing. The lights work perfectly and have a very convenient on/off switch near the base on the lamp. They are fairly bright; probably brighter than they truly need for in-bed reading... but they love them. The goose neck is sturdy and holds the lamp in the exact position you left it. I'd highly recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bedtime Reading
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this light/lamp about 8 years ago to clip to my headboard for nighttime reading. Over time however, the on/off rocker switch came loose, and it wouldn't light anymore without jiggling it. I wore it out! I was happy to see that it was still offered for sale on Amazon and bought a I new one to replace the old. Even though the switch wore out, that was a lot of use for the money, considering I used it practically EVERY night for 8 years. Would I buy it again? Absolutely! It clips nicely without marring and the brightness is perfect for a reading.
customer_reviews.author: Pancho36

customer_reviews.title: May be okay depending on the direction you clamp it on
customer_reviews.text: The light was bright enough for reading purposes. I think the gooseneck was a little too long for my use. The clamp was very strong and would hold anywhere you put it. However, I need to clamp it to the vertical board on my desk rather than horizontally as pictured. The gooseneck just wasn't strong enough to hold up the lamp. It kept falling down no matter what I did. I would push it back up and you could see it slowly falling down. When it did that, it would get in the way of stuff on the shelves on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Great light and great value!!
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright enough for me to do my adult coloring, but soft enough so that I do not get eyestrain from it. The gooseneck is fantastic and adjusts to many angles. The little lamp shade on it keeps the light from getting directly in my eyes. I am thrilled with this! It was worth every penny that I paid, and it really did not cost that much, what a great value!! I strongly recommend it. I was not compensated in anyway for my opinion. I hope that this was helpful to someone! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix teacherTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp for the top of my bed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lamp... it is perfect for the top of my bed for reading and watching Amazon movies on my IPAD. I really liked the larger clamp with suction cups as my headboard is a little wider at the top than most. This lamp was perfect and stays attached to the headboard. On & off switch is very easy to reach when your ready to turn it off - without getting out of bed. My husband bought two for the garage for when he needs extra light doing small things. He loves them !
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Best Clamp Light on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I've bpught quite a lot of clip lights and this is the best. heavy duty metal gooseneck, seriously strong clamp. Yes, it's corded instead of rechargeable, but if I'm reading or doing crafts a rechargeable won't last long so I end up plugging them in anyway. This light has a really generous cord so from the table to the floor and farther is no problem. I can work or read as long as I like without it dimming or dying so win win. I bought a 2nd one and they are both awesome. love this light
customer_reviews.author: Pat Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: This small light is ideal for my purpose of illuminating a small section of a work piece. The clamp is powerful and the suction cups help keep it from slipping. The neck provides plenty of flexibility for adjusting the light. The LED does not generate heat, which I found to be a problem with incandescent bulbs, and it provides more concentrated light than a fluorescent bulb. The diffuser lens prevents glare on the work piece. Clamping the light to a small stool allows me to easily move it around. I'm so pleased that I ordered a second light.
customer_reviews.author: gimpyinlincoln

customer_reviews.title: Works, but a few downsides
customer_reviews.text: This light works as advertised, but there are a couple of things I dislike. I bought it hoping to use it as a reading light after my wife goes to sleep, but it's so bright that it lights up the room the way a ~40W bulb in a sconce fixture would. I also find that the suction cups on the clip actually cause the light to wobble more than if they just put a stronger spring in a simple clip. Overall, the light's fine, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: A company that stands behind their product,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased ny lamp in 2016 and it been providing a very convenient light next to my IMac 5k monitor. The two levels of brightness and the choice of both warm and cool light temperature outputs added to its versatility. So when the control switch began to intermittently flicker after 3+ years, I ordered a replacement the next day. The lamp arrived the following day, and on the box was their lamp warranty for five years and a phone number. Within 30 minutes after I called a representative of Newhouse Lighting with the number on the box, I had a refund of my original purchase price in my checking account. That's a company that stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: this one has only one illumination but fine for reading plus the adjustable arm very strong
customer_reviews.text: Just received...replaced another purchased from Amazon that broke, believe wires inside broke, less then a year old..to old to return.......this one has only one illumination but fine for reading plus the adjustable arm very strong , doesn't waver, well made, believe will get many years of service from it...and light for reading , excellent...price is right too...strongly recommend it...looks good too, not overly contempory..more work shop design but fine for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son to clip onto his desk. It works great and I like how you can adjust the light type and brightness. It also doesn't get hot so I don't have to worry about him getting hurt. The clip is strong and well made. There's small suction cups inside the clip for extra support. He loves to bend the neck and it's good quality, so I'm not worried that he'll break it. Only thing I would change would be the control switch. It's very sensitive and a light tap turns it on. Overall it's a great, sturdy, well made little light.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: First one stopped working after less than a year. Second one only worked one day 😓
customer_reviews.text: Light is perfect, flexibility amazing and looks really well. The issue is that they don’t work!! With the first one, it lasted 10 months and we thought that maybe it was the use that we gave it. But the second one lasted on only one day! And you can’t change the light, so it becomes trash.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Cirulnik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive light. The design is excellent and the build is very good -- definately not the "usual" China quality. We bought it to light our weather station display that is in a very dark corner. The gooseneck does its job very well and the light level is perfect for the job. If we find another use for one of these, we wouldn't hesitate buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: WC7P

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small lamp that was compact enough to be travelable but also powerful enough to light much of a small room. I didn't want blinding light everywhere, just enough so that I can read in bed while also being able to generally look around my bedroom for bugs on the walls and ceilings. This lamp served both purposes, and it was smaller and more compact than I originally thought. The adjustable length is fairly strong and will keep its shape when bent. It seems true, as other reviews noted, that you cannot change the bulb, so I would be careful about that if you're looking for something to keep forever. Overall a pleasant surprise and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: The head is heavy so the neck can't support it.  The lamp always slumps down.  Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: We were just looking for a simple reading lamp that could be clipped onto our bed frame and boy was this lamp a disappointment. The light source itself is decent enough but the head of the lamp is so heavy that it won't stay in the position you want it at. How this lamp got so many stars is beyond me. This company must have paid a lot of people to create accounts and give this garbage product high marks.
customer_reviews.author: Sangy

customer_reviews.title: Nice When Working
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these fixtures. The first one lasted about a year and then died. Not sure what went wrong. It was used pretty much every day, but It was not abused. It was recently replaced with #4. The second one did not work out of the box and was returned. The third one has been in use a little over a year. It gets turned on 4-6 days a week, usually more than once during those days. To sum it up: It is a nice, useful light WHEN it actually works, and I really like the purple color.
customer_reviews.author: W. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This light lasted one year and now it won't work at all
customer_reviews.author: Connie's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the light head being sealed , the brightness is adequate. The only fix-it suggestion would be to make the gooseneck capable of holding any position it placed. It currently doesn't hold a particular bend configuration and you are challenged to make the light shine where you want it without leaning it on something. Not a deal killer for me cause can always figure a way.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Great light - Durable, Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: Great light with diffused lens. Use it for lighting display stands for art shows and exhibitions. Goose-neck adjustment is rigid and stays in place. Clamp is strong and durable. Cable is long enough to get the job done, and the switch is also durable / reliable. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HeavyLunchTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 3 light modes. Easy to use. Convenient and stylish. Also small. Doesn't get in the way. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home desk. I love it! Provides as much light as you need. Very convenient! Easy to move around. Light weight. Has three different colors of light, like a yellow, led, and bluish light. It also has three different light modes. Brightest, bright and dim. I love that I can place this wherever I need it on my desk and get light where I need it most. No issues. Came exactly as described and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I liked the lamp while it worked. died after 4 months. bulb not replaceable. warranted for one year, but no contact info for Newhouse Lighting anywhere on the box or internet. On the box is Adamax (made in China). I found them, they claim Newhouse Lighting as one of their divisions. they have not responded to my inquiry. Amazon replaced the defective lamp (good for them!). again, it made a perfect reading light for the bed, but didnt last very long, and impossible to find the company to honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: padlnjones

customer_reviews.title: Great light for studying!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I want to lay on my bed and study instead of my couch. Problem is I don't have a lamp or light source nearby, so my books always are shadowed. This clamps on to the headboard and stays in place just perfectly. There isn't a way to dim the light, and it is very bright. It works out fine for me, but others may not want it so bright. You could compensate by backing the light away from you though.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few different options before trying out this lamp for my small roll top. I splurged for the white deluxe option with the different light settings and I am so happy I did. I use it near every day and have no problem with it. I often adjust the neck of it while working and it handles the movement without feeling like it will break or wear out. Wish it came in a wide variety of fun colors though. Otherwise, its great!
customer_reviews.author: Suelovelee

customer_reviews.title: Works well, big, sags, AC power only
customer_reviews.text: This is better for general area lighting than for small areas. I like the color temperature. It is almost twice the size I expected. The clamp holds very well, and the built in suction cups help keep it in place. The gooseneck is weaker than I expected, and will sag quickly under the weight of the head. This comes with a small AC adaptor, and cannot be powered from USB.
customer_reviews.author: Doke Scott

customer_reviews.title: Now I See
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for a reading lamp. It is compact has a flexible but firm snake extension (?) that allows pointing the lamp in the direction you like and keeping it there. It attaches by a clamp right onto the post of my low intensity bulb floor lamp and is the brightness to make reading easy. I don't think it would sit directly on a table top. You would need to have something solid to clamp it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice light; great customer service & warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 years ago. It has a 5 year warranty. The downside is that when the light bulb dies, there's no way to replace it, and the unit is no longer useable. But the plus side: Newhouse Lighting honored the warranty (with proof of purchase via Amazon). Fantastic customer service. So much so that I am now looking through their catalog for other lighting options for my house. Strikes me as a very reliable business.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right light
customer_reviews.text: I'm old and need lots of light to see anything I am doing on my workbench in the garage. I bought two of these and am very happy with them. They bend around to put light where I need it, they are stable, the gooseneck is stiff enough to not sag, and the clamp is solid. One is clamped to the shelf at the back of my workbench and the other is clamped to my drill press.
customer_reviews.author: danquo

customer_reviews.title: Useful for some close work-related activities; not suitable for all work-adjustable lighting needs
customer_reviews.text: I was tempted to return this item, as it didn't work for my Mother's needs at all: The mounting surface was a 45-degree "lazy-back" music stand, far less an angle than most. Opening the suction-cup clamp jaw sent a broken, superfluous plastic 'rivet' cover to the floor. The much-less than 22" advertised goose neck failed at this angle, making the lamp sag into the work regardless of how we set it. On any other industrial goose neck build you'll see a long sleeve at the mount point, the weakest link is that point here. I have other goose neck lamps and magnifiers where the flex neck material is far more rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schiring

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, bends well, packs great.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah. We used these to brighten up our booth space at trade shows. They. Worked. Perfectly. Nice and bright, softer light, doesn't stand out too much and block product. I used them to brighten up my mannequins behind the table. The necks are very bendy, and the position holds very well. Easy to adjust. The suction cups are kind of weird but totally made sticking to edges easier. The only thing I worry about is losing the plug in since the plugs are removable. That's my problem though! Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Dumb design
customer_reviews.text: The clip on this lamp is almost impossible to open even with two people and the buttons well there are no buttons there is a smooth compartment where you have to guess where to turn it on and off and press your finger here in there slide it whatever it’s the stupidest thing ever. The lamp is clipped to my make up table and it has popped off twice I would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t plan on controlling with a wall switch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to use as a reading lamp in bed. Looks and works great, nice strong clamp. The power switch, dimmer and temperature control switches take a bit to get use to. You need to tap them vs push/touch them. The bigger issue I have is that the power switch does not default to the on position, so if you hook it up to a wall switch (or smart plug like I tried), the switch will turn it off, but not back on. To turn it up you need to tap the on button on the cord. The lamp does remember the dimmer and temperature settings if you use he On/Off control on the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Light, price and service
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second one. We use it as a light for darts and it is perfect. Bought the first in 2017 and it just stopped working - bought a new one as price is good. In it I noticed it said 5 year warranty. Send an email and had a response in 10 minutes. They are sending a replacement. Awesome service awesome light
customer_reviews.author: Syracuse Pete

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Flicker-Free
customer_reviews.text: It's been years since I've written a review, but this excellent lamp motivated me to share my experiences. This tiny, space-saving, energy-saving lamp provides more light than any of my room lamps, and it is so convenient! I purchased it as a reading lamp at my desk, and have re-ordered another that goes over my washing machine. Now I'm ordering a third as additional light for the bathroom to assist in shaving and makeup. You can't beat this flicker-free, perfect spectrum light for getting your makeup colors right.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Minahan

customer_reviews.title: Met all Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This lamp met my every expectation. After much searching and frustration, I came across this product, read the review and was impressed enough to give it a try. It has the flexibility I and the length I need, the power I need. and the strength needed to hold the lamp on the headboard. I am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Art H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in June.... bulb is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June....bulb is out in October and it is non-replaceable. A nearly $18 bulb basically. Solid little lamp if the manufacturer used a quality bulb.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: At first this was a very nice light but after a month if you barely moved ...
customer_reviews.text: At first this was a very nice light but after a month if you barely moved the lamp head the light would go out. Looks like the wire within the tube is stretched too tight and it losing contact making the light lose power intermittently.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I like the length
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about it and cannot decide whether to give it 3 or 4 stars. On the positive side, it is well made and it stays in the position I put it. Also, I like the length. I wish it was a little brighter. However, some people might be happy with the brightness. The clip does not always work well, depending on the type of surface, width, etc. I think probably all lights of this type have these limitations.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Almost got it right
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and has a soft light for reading while not illuminating the entire room. The on-off and control switch knocked my rating down to a 2 that otherwise would have been a 5. I have to tap several times to turn off and on, very annoying if you're sleepy and just want to relax. Wish it was just a button or switch instead of a tap on flat surface that has a mind of its own whether it wants to cooperate or not.
customer_reviews.author: CharEll

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lamp!! Big time space saver without giving up good lighting! I use this at my teacher table for when we need to have the lights off in the room for educational movies or specific centers. Works so well to illuminate my table so I can continue to work independently or work in small groups with my students. I also love that I can bend and move it to any angle I want. I’ll be buying another one for my nightstand at home!
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: So Many Fun Things To Do With A Light!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this little light for a picture light on a wonderful abstract painting. It lends a kind of whimsy and lights the painting to great advantage. The LEDs shine with just the right quality of light. I can see getting this in various colors and having a lot of fun with them craning their necks in all directions for a lot of purposes. Great value, well made.
customer_reviews.author: J.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: very bright
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product for the price. very surprised how bright it is, clip is very strong with suction cups on the clip for extra support. cord is also long, making it easy to plug in. will buy again, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: michael mancini

customer_reviews.title: High-quality lamp; nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected much less but this lamp is really well-made. The clamp is extremely strong (includes suction cups) and grips my 1-3/8" desktop no problem (I estimate 1-3/4" max). The neck is sturdy; it stays put. The light itself is easy on the eyes, good for reading tech drawings / wiring diagrams etc., which is why I bought it. The brightness is similar to a ~75W regular incandescent. For less than twenty dollars I think this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rico C.

customer_reviews.title: Too bright for us
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use these for reading lights on the bunkbeds. The idea was that one kid could read even if the other wanted to go to sleep. I was hoping these would be just enough light, like the ones that clip to the book. Only I went with these because they plug in and the kids often forget to turn off the reading light before falling asleep. And batteries get expensive. Anyway, good light, good clip, flexible neck. Just FYI to anyone sharing a room. It does light up the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Parton

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, when it works!
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a bedside light. The clamp mechanism was easy to attach to my 2 inch thick wooden headboard. The "neck" of the lamp is very malleable and easy to change positioning. I love that it has 3 options for light color and 3 brightness settings. Only downside is the "touch" control to power on/off, light color, and brightness. The "touch" control is not very responsive and I have to struggle with it until it works. Basically, the faulty control renders the lamp useless if I cant turn turn it on or adjust the light. They need to improve or redesign the control.
customer_reviews.author: zelevyn

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT night time reading light.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, plenty of bright warm reading light, the gooseneck allows me to bring the light closer if I need it. Good cord length and thoughtful placement of the toggle switch near the clip on base. Handy suction cup strips inside the clamp for extra security. I'm constantly bending the gooseneck closer for late night reading and back up away for use as a bedside light and the clamp has not budged.
customer_reviews.author: Ky Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love so much I'm buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Looked around Lot for a good lamp for our 9yr old and did not even know something like this existed. So glad we bought this! Fits perfectly on her vanity. Love how it clips on so you don't take up room on the desk. The clip was more than I expected. Super strong and the suction on there made for tight grip. Going back to buy 2 more for myself and my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy760

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light, adjustable but not that adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for what it is but not exactly what I'd hoped it would be. The neck isn't as flexible as I'd like. This is used in my daughters' room as a reading light and also a night light. The reading part is fine but then it isn't adjustable enough to use as a night light as well. It's very bright. I think it would be difficult to use in a dorm room unless it could be behind a closet or dividing feature.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light Minus the Fact That You Can't Replace the Bulb.........
customer_reviews.text: We use this light in our kitchen at night. Its the perfect brightness and doesn't get hot. The only problem I have with this light is that when it burns out you have to throw it out (can't replace the bulb). It's my fault for not reading the entire description before purchasing, but for now it's great!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is attached to a lectern in our small church. It's been in use at least once a week for the past year. Gets plenty of "handling" and some abuse. We screwed the clamp to the lectern to prevent anyone from borrowing it. It holds up great and has been totally reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Greggg

customer_reviews.title: Not good for night reading
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clip on my headboard to read at night. Unfortunately the light is so bright it lights up the whole room rather than providing a discrete spotlight for reading material. Also, while flexible, the neck is very long and cumbersome. This lamp would be perfect for use in a workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Chapeauchat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIGHT FOR LITE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my computer desk - It gives off great softer light than that annoying, glaring blue light you normally get in LED's. Nice length to gooseneck and very flexible. Clamp is strong and fits my desk edge very well. The top of my desk is slick but this lamp stays put due to the rubber/silicone cups at the bottom. I deducted one star because the lighting module is non-replaceable. Light does come with 12 month warranty. Well worth the $17 I think.
customer_reviews.author: Catzz

customer_reviews.title: Clamp light so know how wide clamp opens. It has very short switch cord
customer_reviews.text: nice bright LED lamp. Am using for a glass display situation so clamp had to be taped down and neck rigged to back wall. Had this type here before but this is a bit heavier has good light filter over lamp. It is brighter then expected for size. Plan for short switch cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for reading light.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice soft reading light. Great adjustable neck is just the right size for angle versatility. Also love the switch on/off connected to cord which makes for very easy on and off when on bed frame as reading light. Rubber suction cups keep clip from marking wooden bed frame as well. Highly recommend for price. Not a replaceable bulb -- the one downside, but I kinda wonder if that might actually be possible to work around. Haven't tried because I love it as is for now.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: This is one solid little light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little light. The clip attachment works well...nice and strong hold. The neck can be arranged in lots of ways and seems both flexible and stiff if that makes any sense. I got the blue color and it really pops. The light itself is a whole lot brighter than I thought it would be. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Camazon Amustomers

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Clippable bendable LED lamps are versatile. This was my first purchase of such a lamp and having used it for several months now I still like it. It's well built and comes with a plug. Some others come with a USB head and can be used with a power bank. This once can only be plugged in. The arm is strong yet flexible. The only weak part is the clip. It's made of plastic and the metal neck weighs it down making it a tiny bit wobbly. But as long as your clipping place isn't extra wide it should work. The black and chrome finish goes with every decor.
customer_reviews.author: Chandrima

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, compact design; all the settings I need (warm/cool, dim, medium, bright). I’ll be ordering two more for accent lighting—
customer_reviews.author: Ladd E.

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is great little reading lamp for the price. Very big, sturdy clamp. It easily clamped to the top of my son's headboard, which is wider than the rest of the headboard. Great light for reading bedtime stories with him at night without having light shine directly in your eyes. There is a switch in the cord, easy to reach near the clamp. Nice color. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR BED HEADBOARDS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two lights for our bedroom for reading. I hung them on our headboard but no matter how I put them they will not stay there. Every other night they fall off. Also, the lights are very hard to turn on. After fumbling around I can get one on but not without a great deal of manipulating. My husband has the same trouble. I do not recommend these lamps for the headboards of a bed. I will be giving them to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McClane

customer_reviews.title: Great find for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Use this in our camp trailer, when my husband wants to sleep, I can have the light directly over my book, and read until I am ready to call it a night. Clips on to the shelf above the bed. Very sturdy clip.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Steward

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on impulse & regretted it until it came. I did need a lamp, I did need the gooseneck, I did need it on a clip. I didn't think the LEDs would be bright enough but they absolutely are.
customer_reviews.author: wabbitt

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm Light Source!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to install in my camper and just LOVE them. Nice warm light glow, enough brightness, and a high quality switch. Funny thing though...from the factory the clamps were stuck together and I could not squeeze them apart. So, take a screw driver and separate the suction, and place a piece of paper between the suction cups so they will separate. If you are moving them often, then this may be a problem. For my part, I have them installed now and will not be moving.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kruzic

customer_reviews.title: Such a handy great reading light!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this little light. The first one lasted about a year, and then the on/off switch broke. I called the company directly, and they whisked a new one right back out to me at no charge. Really. I clip it on everywhere. It's super handy, and I really need that directed light for reading. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: GREAT READING LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I attached the light to my headboard (Round Tube) and it holds securely. The adjustable neck is perfect to point the light where I want it. It's bright enough to read with but, not overly bright. Great price and arrived quickly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lone Sentry

customer_reviews.title: Versatility.
customer_reviews.text: These are great little lights. I bought 3 of them! They’re great for reading, doing crafts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chris sue

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: I give this 2 stars, the lamp is great but unfortunately less then a year the housing where the electrical power switch is broken and exposing wiring, causing light flickering from a short in the housing area of the power switch. It’s a shame, its a great little lamp perfect for your nightstand, read books etc. see pictures. Update: Gone into the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Los Ángeles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for top bunk
customer_reviews.text: We got this so our oldest could read on the top bunk after his younger brother was asleep. I like that it doesn't get hot so I don't have to worry about it burning him or catching bedding on fire. I also like the easy to use switch so he can operate it easily by himself.
customer_reviews.author: BRKeesee

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp, small illuminated area.
customer_reviews.text: The clamp and gooseneck are strong enough to hold the lamp in any desired position. That's key for a lamp like this. The head is only the brightness of a small LED flashlight, but they're pretty upfront about that - it says "300lm" and "3 watt" right in the product description. So it's not going to light up your desk, but if you're, say, doing some sewing with a needle and thread and you need to see the thread going into the needle, you can aim the light right in there.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Yelon

customer_reviews.title: Bad wiring
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased 2 of these in the last 4 years and both times the wires have failed causing the light to flicker and then finally giving out altogether. Something is not designed properly. Otherwise, the light fits my needs perfectly. I’m really disappointed its not made better.
customer_reviews.author: Elcee

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Read the good reviews and decided to purchase as reading light for my 9 year old. Clamp worked well but on night 3 he tried to adjust the “flexible” arm and it snapped off at the base (see photo). Good product as long as you don’t need the arm to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Light is bright enough to make a difference in low light and not be too bright in darkness. Arm is flexible, but sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bevier

customer_reviews.title: Really Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: Like most other reviewers I was pleasantly surprised at how bright this light is. I bought it to replace and cheaper clip on reading light that I will review later. All metal construction and the clips have suction cups for added stability. I clip it onto my music stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fritchman

customer_reviews.title: Good light, clamp needs more work
customer_reviews.text: This light is very bright, but I wish the clamp part was longer depth-wise to grasp better, one good shake and it can fall off, perhaps if the clamp parts were pre molded differently, It would be more secure. I can't position the light without holding onto the clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Ameraweazel2

customer_reviews.title: Not for Every Setup
customer_reviews.text: This light is a nice concept, but doesn't really work for me as I have to put fabric inside the clamps and open it around a book or something else that's flat and set on my night table. It won't clamp around my night table.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light for reading! Easy to use! Easy to assemble! Does what it says!
customer_reviews.author: Zeta Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Stuck on blue light
customer_reviews.text: This light was really great for a little while. I like that it has an option that is more yellow than blue light. But I’ve only had it for a couple months and now it’s stuck on the blue light option which I really don’t like. This kinda light hurts my eyes for some reason so I’m not using it much now. Everything else is really great about it except the touch control.
customer_reviews.author: Shubbard

customer_reviews.title: Live it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to attach to my laptop table on wheels It’s small enough and bendy enough to put the light right over my laptop keyboard. No more hunting and pecking for the right letters. It does not interfere with screen
customer_reviews.author: Babzdragon

customer_reviews.title: Worked well out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just what I needed for illumination next to my laptop. It clamps to the table tightly. A hint: Put a thin cloth (lens cleaner) under the clamps in order to move the fixture at will. The clamp is initially reluctant to open but it "snaps" first, then opens wide. The neck is very flexible as long as you don't manipulate it from the base. Treat it gingerly and it will perform for you. I wouldn't recommend using it on a headboard because of gravity. It's designed to be used vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Potter Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp. I got this lamp to put on a loft bed for my 9 year old. The bed is made of 2x6s and the clip was big enough to clip onto the bed. There is a switch on the cord pretty close to the lamp. It works perfectly for a reading light clipped to the bed. The neck of the lamp is flexible but stays in place well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice for bunk beds
customer_reviews.text: My daughters bunk bed light quit working so needed a new one quickly, this is a great little lamp, been using it for a few weeks now. Happy. Update - nearly 2 years and it's still working great, just bought a second one :)
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great little light!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter so she could read in bed at night. I thought it would be perfect because of the LED light not getting hot and possibly burning the poor child. Boy was I right!!! She loves this light!!! It provides a nice white light that is more than bright enough for reading! The clip for the light also has little suction cups on it so that it remains more stable when repositioning the neck of the light. All in all, highly satisfied with this purchase and would recommend to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: applecheeks7592

customer_reviews.title: Great decorator colors available and directed warm light!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps clamp on tight - so they can't be knocked over - damaging the bulb. The colors of the fixtures are bright and cheerful and do direct a warm light where you want it. I bought three and really like them. The only problem is - as pretty as they are - they will self destruct after the LED bulb wears out - I think that is the nature of some LED lamp technology though. Otherwise, a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: Decent lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a brighter lamp, but it works ok. The bendable arm is ok too. Not as stiff as I had hoped, so it doesn't stay in the place where it is placed all that great. I will find a use for it. Maybe a reading light?
customer_reviews.author: MizMikk

customer_reviews.title: Good bright light!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandaughter so she could clip it to her bed and read and she loves it. Purple color is very nice. I also bought one for my husband who has trouble seeing and clipped it on the the kitchen cupboard and it is perfect. Has three lighting strengths which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri

customer_reviews.title: bulb life not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have now bought 2 of these , my bad. "up to 30,000 hrs" is wildly optimistic.The light works as advertised, and I liked it. However the bulb has lasted less than 800 hrs for me, twice.Warranted for 1 yr, but I can't find a way to contact manufacturer. The light is recommended by Amazon, but not by me.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M.

customer_reviews.title: Handy little light for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reading light that would clip onto the arm of my chair and is bright enough to make reading at night easier. This light fits the bill. Seems sturdy and well made and a very good price. Much nicer than a book light!
customer_reviews.author: Anja

customer_reviews.title: I've never had a lamp like this, which doesn't have a replaceable bulb
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a lamp like this, which doesn't have a replaceable bulb, but I love it. While I feel bad for contributing to pollution with something that is specifically bought to throw away when it dies, it works very well and has been remarkably useful as an office lamp. I re-position it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Fobetta Ophowerse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: Bedside lamps never seem to throw enough light on a book or tablet, unless you are turned towards them and almost falling out of bed. Decided to try this, clamped to the top rail of an old-fashioned metal bed. It works perfectly! Clamp fits tightly, and would fit a rail twice as thick; flexible neck allows readjustment to reading position; cord is just above your head for easy turn off when you're done; and suction cups protect the bed structure.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: and this was the perfect buy I gave done in a while
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp because since I share a bed with my little brother and he goes to sleep earlier than I do I needed something that gives light but to the point that it does not bother my little brothers sleep, and this was the perfect buy I gave done in a while! :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great little light.
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this light, which I have clipped to my headboard. If you have trouble reading in low light, this is the light for you. The clip is sturdy and has a good grip. The neck of the light is flexable, and can be positioned to shine it's light right where you need it. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Only works vertically
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to clamp this to a vertical partition but the light will not stay put. It only works if the mounting clamp is clamped to a typical horizontal desk surface.
customer_reviews.author: Dennylxs

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Very White
customer_reviews.text: Elegantly simple lamp. I needed more light for my lathe. This just clips on to the shelf above it and provides bright, very white light.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton E. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk light.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I literally can clip it on to anything and light up almost my whole room with ambiance lighting. It’s also good for studying next to. It’s been great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tinasiah M

customer_reviews.title: Newhouse Lighting LED Clip on Light/Clamp Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I clamp this light on my desk for reading. I like the flexibility of positioning the light into multiple positions for maximum light coverage of reading materials.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: fits my needs and works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clip on my bed for nighttime reading. It is perfect: bright, light-weight, doesn't produce heat. The only thing I'd change is I wish the clip were reversed because the in order to have the switch within reach I have to have the lamp coming from behind the bed. Still, I've made it work. Oh, the cord is in two pieces and can easily come apart, but I've rigged it with a rubber band so it stays together with no problem. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. Clipped it to my headboard. Never wakes my husband up, but bright enough to read, rumble thru my nightstand, make it in and out of my bedroom for a glass of water.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marcotte-Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Stable light platform fits any stable surface for stable lighting
customer_reviews.text: The clamp is designed to clamp onto things stable so that the clamping action holds the light stable and still and still provides light while being clamped to a stable surface and or still platform. The goose's neck can be shaped into any shape resembling most animals.
customer_reviews.author: Don E. Nelson

product_meta.title: Newhouse Lighting 3-Watt Energy-Efficient LED Clamp Lamp, Purple
product_meta.description:
Color:Purple| Style:BasicUltimate versatility is what the Newhouse LED Flex Clamp Lamp is all about. With a strong clamp holding it in place, the Flex Clamp Lamp provides bright, usable light right where you need it. Top uses include clamping onto dorm room furniture, or as the perfect bedside reading light. We know you will enjoy its flexibility and come up with some great uses. As with all of our lamps, it uses the latest in LED technology and delivers quality light while being extremely energy efficient. 

Make the switch to LED today.
Make mother nature proud.
feature_bullets: High-quality LEDs: Energy saving LED lights provides efficient non-flickering natural warm light, and an illuminating diffuser keeps eye strain at bay
Modern style: The sleek, modern, adjustable and flexible metal gooseneck, 6 foot power cord, and handy on/off switch provide great light at any angle
Over 100,000+ sold... across black, purple, and blue colors since 2013. Student, parents, readers, and makers agree that this versatile lamp is a keeper!
Warm Light: LED provides 350 Lumens and 3000K of bright, warm white LED light.
Long lasting: LEDs do not need to be replaced (lasting up to 30,000 hours or more). Rest assured with a 5-year warranty and friendly, US based customer service
Strong clamp allows great versatility: Perfect for use as a as a night light, desk lamp, book lamp, for reading in bed, or on an office desk, drafting table, desk table, bedside table

Powerful and compact: Excellent for college and university students who need a small footprint LED desk lamp, reading lamp, clamp light, clip lamp, or bed light for studying or reading in the dorm room on a computer desk
The highest quality energy saving LEDs provides efficient non-flickering natural warm light for stress free productivity and enjoyment.
The sleek, modern, adjustable and flexible metal gooseneck provides great light right where you want it.
Strong clamp allows great versatility; mount to bedframe, nightstand, dorm room furniture & accessories, home office tables, bedroom desks, or study areas.
LED provides 300 Lumens and 3000K bright warm color light.
Great for all age groups, girls, boys, kids, teens, and adults alike with 3 color choices (black, blue & purple).
Excellent for college and university students who needs small footprint lights for reading and studying.
Comes with super long life LED module (up to 30,000 hours) that never needs to be replaced (1-year warranty against manufacturer defects).

specifications.Included Components: Desk Lamp, Power Adapter, Manual, Club Card
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,934 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
